item.title: Kotlinconf 2018 slides
item.author: info@jeroenmols.com (Jeroen Mols)
item.description: Was really great visiting Kotlinconf this year and I wanted to do a quick post to link to all of it’s wonderful content. Conference slides # While you will be able to find all recordings here, I often find it useful to be able to quickly scan through the slides.
